column1: Total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains only letters written to them from Erasmus but not vice versa
column2: Percentage of the total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains only letters written to them from Erasmus but not vice versa of the total number of correspondents
column3: Total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains only letters written from them to Erasmus but not vice versa
column4: Percentage of the total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains only letters written from them to Erasmus but not vice versa of the total number of correspondents
column5: Total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains a reciprocal correspondence with Erasmus
column6: Percentage of the total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains a reciprocal correspondence with Erasmus of the total number of correspondents
